Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Surprising \Sur*pris"ing\, a. Exciting surprise; extraordinary; of a nature to excite wonder and astonishment; as, surprising bravery; a surprising escape from danger. -- {Sur*pris"ing*ly}, adv. -- {Sur*pris"ing*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Wonderful; extraordinary; unexpected; astonishing; striking. [1913 Webster]

surprisingly adv 1: in a surprising manner; "he was surprisingly friendly" 2: in an amazing manner; to everyone's surprise; "amazingly, he finished medical school in three years" [syn: {amazingly}, {astonishingly}]
